name: Scooped: Michelada Sorbet
description: The michelada is probably my favorite summertime drink, an incredibly refreshing beer cocktail made of a Mexican pilsner-style beer with tomato juice, hot sauce, lime juice and salt. Why not, we wondered, serve it up in frozen form? Sure, it's not as sweet as most ice creams, but what could be better for a summer afternoon than frozen beer? This ice cream is actually quite savory. There's as much salt in the recipe as sugar.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups (8 ounces) Mexican pilsner, like Pacifico, Modelo Especial or Tecate
Approximately 1/4 sugar (dissolved in a couple tablespoons of hot water)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients except the salt and sugar in a mixing bowl. Add the salt and sugar little by little, to taste.
Spin in ice cream machine, and enjoy!
